tool_description: The South Africa API provides a set of endpoints to access various geographical information and services related to locations in South Africa. With this API, you can perform geocoding, reverse geocoding, retrieve facilities, calculate distances between locations, and obtain directions for routes in South Africa. The API utilizes external services such as Nominatim for geocoding and reverse geocoding, and the OSRM API for route calculations.
name: South Africa API
title: South Africa API

api_list.name: Get Directions
api_list.description: Retrieves directions and route information between two locations in South Africa. This endpoint allows you to provide the latitude and longitude coordinates of the starting and ending points and obtain detailed directions, distance, and duration of travel between them. It utilizes the OSRM API to calculate the route.

required_parameters.name: end_lat
required_parameters.description: The latitude coordinate of the ending point.

required_parameters.name: end_lon
required_parameters.description: The longitude coordinate of the ending point.

required_parameters.name: start_lat
required_parameters.description: The latitude coordinate of the starting point.

required_parameters.name: start_lon
required_parameters.description: The longitude coordinate of the starting point.

api_list.name: Calculate Distance Reverse
api_list.description: Calculates the distance and duration between two addresses in South Africa. This endpoint allows you to provide the start and stop addresses and obtain the distance and duration of travel between them. It uses OpenStreetMap for geocoding and the OSRM Project for route calculation.

required_parameters.name: stop_address
required_parameters.description: The address of the stop location.

required_parameters.name: start_address
required_parameters.description: The address of the start location.

api_list.name: Calculate Distance
api_list.description: Calculates the distance and duration between two locations in South Africa. This endpoint allows you to provide the latitude and longitude coordinates of two locations and obtain the distance and duration of travel between them. It utilizes the OSRM API for route calculation.

required_parameters.name: lon2
required_parameters.description: The longitude coordinate of the stop location.

required_parameters.name: lon1
required_parameters.description: The longitude coordinate of the start location.

required_parameters.name: lat1
required_parameters.description: The latitude coordinate of the start location.

required_parameters.name: lat2
required_parameters.description: The latitude coordinate of the stop location.

optional_parameters.name: unit
optional_parameters.description:
The unit of distance measurement (**km**, **mi**, **ft**, **yd**). 
Optional, default: **km**

api_list.name: Geocode Reverse
api_list.description: Retrieves reverse geocoding information for a given latitude and longitude in South Africa. This endpoint allows you to provide latitude and longitude coordinates and obtain detailed information about the corresponding location in South Africa. It uses OpenStreetMap for reverse geocoding.

api_list.name: Search
api_list.description: Searches for facilities in South Africa based on the facility name. This endpoint allows you to perform a search for facilities in South Africa using the facility name as a query parameter. You can specify the maximum number of facilities to retrieve using the optional **limit** parameter.

required_parameters.name: name
required_parameters.description: The name of the facility to search for.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: The maximum number of facilities to retrieve.

api_list.name: Facilities Lookup
api_list.description: Retrieves health facilities in South Africa based on facility type, region, and city. This endpoint allows you to lookup facilities such as hospitals, clinics, bank, university etc., in South Africa.

api_list.name: Geocode
api_list.description: Retrieves location information for a given address in South Africa.
